name: Line Triangle
description:
Challenge your own limits with Line Triangle. Dodge and shoot obstacles in frenzy and addictive levels without taking a single hit.

How many tries will it cost you to overcome it?

Features:

-5 Complete levels full of adrenaline.
-Infinity mode, how long will you last?
- Electronic soundtracks.
- More than 70 skins.
- Various modes of controls.
- collectibles.
